query: SELECT lobbyisttype, SUM(1) AS registration_count, date_trunc_ym(initialregistrationdate) AS registration_month WHERE initialregistrationdate >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY lobbyisttype, registration_month ORDER BY registration_month, lobbyisttype

column_metadata.description: Type of lobbyist, either contact or expenditure

table_metadata.title: Lobbyist Directory
table_metadata.description: This dataset contains registered lobbyists with the Ethics Commission. It covers both Contact and Expenditure Lobbyists.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: Policy analysts, journalists, and government officials

title: Lobbyist Directory
